variables.name: Variables and Data Types
variables.content:
Variables and Data Types

Common Data Types:
  • Integer: Whole numbers (int)
  • Float: Decimal numbers
  • String: Text (str)
  • Boolean: True/False (bool)
Variable Rules:
  • Must start with letter or underscore
  • Case-sensitive
  • Cannot use reserved keywords

control_structures.name: Control Structures
control_structures.content:
Control Flow

Conditional Statements:
if condition:    # If statement
    # code here
elif condition:  # Else if
    # code here
else:            # Else
    # code here
Loops:
# For loop
for i in range(5):
    print(i)

# While loop
while condition:
    # code here

functions.name: Functions
functions.content:
Functions

Reusable blocks of code.

Syntax:
def function_name(parameters):
    # code here
    return value
Example:
def add(a, b):
    return a + b

result = add(5, 3)  # result = 8

arrays.name: Arrays/Lists
arrays.content:
Arrays and Lists

Ordered collections of elements.

Operations:
  • Access: list[index]
  • Add: list.append(item)
  • Remove: list.remove(item)
  • Length: len(list)

stacks_queues.name: Stacks and Queues
stacks_queues.content:
Stacks (LIFO)

Last In, First Out. Like a stack of plates.

  • push: Add to top
  • pop: Remove from top

Queues (FIFO)

First In, First Out. Like a line of people.

  • enqueue: Add to back
  • dequeue: Remove from front
